item.description:
It's BACK!!!
The traditional HHTC Holiday Party at the Ring Residence.

As usual, the house will be dressed for the holiday - so should you!

Trying something different this year... no full dinner, just appetizers and desserts!
We'll have non-alcoholic beverages and all the paper goods; Bring your fave appetizer or dessert (and recipe) and a $15. value gift for the Yankee Swap.

RSVP on meetup or call Linda or Ralph at 860-635-7622

Check out the flyer in the More... Files section!
item.how_to_find_us: This is a private home, so please call to RSVP and you'll get the address!
item.name: Ring in the Holidays...
